author: prbuzz.com
title: QuWave Announces Labor Day Sale
text:
Ledgewood, NJ (PR Buzz) August 26, 2015--- QuWave announces their Labor Day sale ending on September 7 at midnight (Pacific Standard Time). All products in the QuWave store will be $50 off during this period.
The coupon code for the sale is "labor15" and needs to be entered at checkout on the shopping cart screen under "discount code." The "update cart" button must also be clicked after this to update the cart when the discount code is entered.
All QuWave products, including our popular Defender and Harmonizer lines, will be $50 off for the duration of the sale. Other unique products QuWave offers include the Energizer , designed to charge food, water or jewelry with orgone (chi) energy, the Law of Attraction Money Magnet, designed to improve visualizations and affirmations with the Law of Attraction, and the Divine, designed to improve meditation and spiritual experiences (including opening the Third Eye and stimulating the Pineal Gland).
This discount can be combined with already discounted bundle packages. For example, if someone were to buy the Couples Protection Discount Package , which is $397 for two Personal Harmonizers, the package would be an additional $50 off. That is a $247 discount (the Personal Harmonizer is originally priced at $297).
Labor Day is a holiday in the United States celebrated on the first Monday in September. It is dedicated to the social and economic achievements of workers since 1887.
More info on the sale can be found at http://quwave.com/laborday2015.html
About QuWave:
QuWave LLC, a prominent organization in the energy medicine field, manufacturing unique and active products that block the negative effects of EMF pollution and radiation while also generating Scalar Waves, Solfeggio Frequencies, Schumann Resonance, and Chi Orgone energies to promote a healthy, balanced lifestyle. QuWave is an online company located in Ledgewood, NJ that has customers, affiliates, and resellers around the world. For more information on QuWave, visit www.QuWave.com
